title: comp crash
body: so about 2 min ago my computer crashed, i was in a game i figured no big deal ill re join.....when i reopened my client i didnt rejoin my game and im certain that my team wouldnt of ended in the 30ish seconds i was gone.....is this a client bug coz i cant even find the game i was in, in my recent games played

replies.body: The game may have been remade if you crashed prior to the game starting. Match History was also having problems during this time, which may explain why you didn't see it.
